item.title: 台湾和硕表示已进入评估美国工厂计划的最后阶段
item.description: 苹果和戴尔的主要供应商和硕联合公司（Pegatron）总裁兼首席执行官郑匡志周五告诉股东们，该公司对其美国工厂计划的评估已进入最后阶段，并将于本月或下月公布决定。【原文：Key Apple and Dell supplier Pegatron is in the final stage of evaluating its U.S. factory plan and is set to unveil a decision this month or next, its president and CEO Kuang-Chih Cheng told shareholders on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，印尼财富基金考虑入股 Grab-GoTo 交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，新成立的主权财富基金印尼达纳塔拉公司（Danantara Indonesia）正在与GoTo公司进行早期谈判，以在美国上市的竞争对手Grab可能对该打车和食品配送公司的收购中分一杯羹。【原文：Newly-launched sovereign wealth fund Danantara Indonesia is in early talks with GoTo to get a piece of U.S.-listed rival Grab's potential buyout of the ride-hailing and food delivery firm, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 在竞争日益激烈的情况下，MercadoLibre 在顶级市场巴西扩大免费送货范围
item.description: 拉美电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周五表示，将在其主要市场巴西扩大免费送货范围，预计此举成本高昂，但该公司希望此举能在激烈的竞争中推动销售额增长。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre is expanding free shipping in its main market Brazil, it said on Friday, a move expected to be costly but which the company hopes will drive sales higher amid fierce competition.】

item.title: 中美重启贸易谈判，油价有望实现稳健的周涨幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平重启贸易谈判后，油价周五有所下滑，但有望实现三周来的首次单周上涨，这为世界两大经济体的增长和需求强劲带来了希望。【原文：Oil prices slipped on Friday but were on track for their first weekly gain in three weeks after U.S. President Donald Trump and China's Xi Jinping resumed trade talks, raising hopes for growth and stronger demand in the world's two largest economies.】

item.title: 股市警惕非农数据，特斯拉暴跌，特朗普与马斯克关系变差
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市低迷，因为投资者都在等待重要的就业报告，而特斯拉则因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克之间公开的不和而蒙受巨大损失。【原文：Asian shares were subdued on Friday as investors hunkered down for the all-important payrolls report, while Tesla suffered huge losses on the very public feud between President Donald Trump and billionaire Elon Musk.】

item.title: 美元受困于美国经济疲软和贸易困境
item.description: 由于美国经济出现脆弱迹象，以及华盛顿与其贸易伙伴之间的贸易谈判在最后期限即将到来之际仍进展甚微，美元汇率在周五遭遇了一周来的最大跌幅。【原文：The dollar was headed for a weekly loss on Friday, undermined by signs of fragility in the U.S. economy and as trade negotiations between Washington and its trading partners made little progress despite a looming deadline.】

item.title: 马斯克称 SpaceX 不会让 "龙 "退役
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，在他与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的争执升级之际，他的火箭公司 SpaceX 将开始退役龙飞船（Dragon spacecraft）。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said on Thursday that his rocket company SpaceX will not decommission its Dragon spacecraft just hours after stating that the company would begin decommissioning amid his escalating feud with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 亚马逊将投资超过 50 亿美元在台湾新建 AWS 区域
item.description: 亚马逊周四宣布启动亚马逊网络服务（AWS）亚太（台北）地区，并计划投资 50 多亿美元支持其在台湾的数据中心的建设、连接、运营和维护。【原文：Amazon announced the launch of the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Asia Pacific (Taipei) Region on Thursday, along with plans to invest more than $5 billion to support the construction, connection, operation, and maintenance of its data centers in Taiwan.】

item.title: 亚马逊裁员更多，这次是图书部门
item.description: 亚马逊周四表示，该公司已经裁减了图书部门的工作岗位，包括 Goodreads 评论网站和 Kindle 部门。【原文：Amazon has cut jobs in its books division, including at its Goodreads review site and Kindle units, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 将就《纽约时报》的诉讼要求提起上诉，要求不删除任何用户聊天记录
item.description: OpenAI 周四表示，它正在对《纽约时报》要求 ChatGPT 制造商无限期保留消费者 ChatGPT 和 API 客户数据的诉讼提起上诉。【原文：OpenAI said on Thursday that it is appealing The New York Times' lawsuit demanding that the ChatGPT-maker retain consumer ChatGPT and API customer data indefinitely.】

item.title: 参议院共和党人提议取消燃油经济性处罚
item.description: 参议院共和党人周四提议，作为一项范围广泛的税收法案的一部分，取消对未能达到企业平均燃料经济性规定的汽车制造商的罚款，这对底特律销售汽油动力汽车的汽车制造商来说是一个利好消息。【原文：Senate Republicans on Thursday proposed eliminating fines for automakers who fail to meet Corporate Average Fuel Economy rules as part of a wide-ranging tax bill, a boost to Detroit automakers selling gas-powered vehicles.】

item.title: 汇丰任命审计委员会主席 Brendan Nelson 为集团临时主席
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings PLC）周五表示，集团审计委员会主席布兰登-尼尔森（Brendan Nelson）将担任集团临时主席，马克-塔克（Mark Tucker）将于 9 月 30 日卸任。【原文：HSBC Holdings PLC , said on Friday that Brendan Nelson, chair of its group audit committee, will serve as interim group chairman following the retirement of Mark Tucker, who will step down from the role on September 30.】

item.title: 美国财政部：日本央行应继续收紧政策
item.description: 美国财政部周四表示，日本央行应继续收紧货币政策，这将支持 "日元疲软正常化 "和双边贸易的再平衡。【原文：The Bank of Japan should continue to proceed with monetary tightening, which would support a "normalization of the yen's weakness" and rebalancing of bilateral trade, the U.S. Treasury Department said on Thursday.】

item.title: Citadel 的埃斯波西托称美国赤字是 "定时炸弹
item.description: Citadel 公司总裁吉姆-埃斯波西托（Jim Esposito）周四表示，美国政府不断增长的债务是一颗 "定时炸弹"，特朗普政府如何应对这场危机将变得 "超级重要"。【原文：The U.S. government's growing debt pile is a "ticking time bomb" and how the Trump administration reacts to this crisis is going to be "super important", Citadel President Jim Esposito said on Thursday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙主席莎莉-雷德斯通披露甲状腺癌诊断结果
item.description: 派拉蒙主席莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）的发言人周四在给路透社的一份声明中说，她在今年春天早些时候被诊断出患有甲状腺癌。【原文：Paramount chair Shari Redstone was diagnosed with thyroid cancer earlier this spring, Redstone's spokesperson said in a statement to Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 朝日新闻》报道：日本放宽对美国废除汽车关税的要求，提出缩减计划
item.description: 据日本《朝日新闻》周五报道，日本已经放宽了全面废除美国25%汽车关税的要求，转而提议根据各国对美国汽车产业的贡献程度来建立一个降低关税的机制。【原文：Japan has eased its demand for a full repeal of the 25% U.S. auto tariff and is instead proposing a mechanism to reduce the rate based on how much countries contribute to the U.S. auto industry, the Asahi newspaper reported on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称巴西政府将为减税 10%的法案辩护
item.description: 两位消息人士周四告诉路透社，巴西政府预计将支持一项法案，该法案提议将联邦税收减免削减 10%，作为上个月提出的有争议的提高金融交易税（IOF）的主要替代方案。【原文：Brazil's government is expected to back a bill proposing a 10% cut to federal tax breaks as the main alternative to a controversial increase in the tax on financial transactions (IOF) proposed last month, two sources told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国确保亚马逊采取行动打击虚假评论
item.description: 英国竞争监督机构周五表示，亚马逊已承诺采取更多措施打击虚假评论，包括制裁那些通过虚假帖子提高评价的英国企业。【原文：Amazon has committed to do more to tackle fake reviews, including sanctioning British businesses that boost their ratings through bogus posts, the country's competition watchdog said on Friday.】

item.title: 解说员：与特朗普的争执升级是否对马斯克企业构成监管威胁？
item.description: 在这位亿万富翁与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的深厚政治关系于周四瓦解之后，美国交通、环境、通信和其他监管机构将瞄准埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下众多企业的风险成为了一个真正的威胁。【原文：The risk U.S. transportation, environmental, communications and other regulators will take aim at Elon Musk's many businesses became a real threat after the billionaire's deep political ties with President Donald Trump disintegrated on Thursday.】

item.title: 新日铁与美国寻求暂停诉讼 8 天以解决交易问题
item.description: 新日铁公司和特朗普政府周四请求美国上诉法院将双方诉讼的暂停期延长八天，以便双方有更多时间达成协议，使日本公司能够继续推进其 149 亿美元的美国钢铁公司竞购计划。【原文：Nippon Steel and the Trump administration on Thursday asked a U.S. appeals court to extend a pause in their litigation for eight days, to give them more time to reach a deal allowing the Japanese firm to move forward with its $14.9 billion bid for U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 独家报道芝加哥私募股权公司持有加沙援助公司股份
item.description: 一家总部位于芝加哥的私募股权公司--由美国出版公司兰德-麦克纳利（Rand McNally）创始人家族的一位成员控制--在一家参与在加沙开展有争议的新援助分发行动的物流公司中拥有 "经济利益"。【原文：A Chicago-based private equity firm - controlled by a member of the family that founded American publishing company Rand McNally - has an "economic interest" in the logistics company involved in a controversial new aid distribution operation in Gaza.】

item.title: 美国未发现汇率操纵者，但将爱尔兰和瑞士纳入监控范围
item.description: 美国财政部周四表示，在截至 12 月底的四个季度中，美国的主要贸易伙伴都没有操纵本国货币，但美国财政部已将其监控名单扩大到九个国家。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Thursday that no major U.S. trading partners manipulated their currencies in the four quarters through to the end of December but it has expanded its monitoring list to nine countries.】

item.title: Circle 的大手笔 IPO 为其他加密货币上市铺平了道路
item.description: 据专家和分析师称，稳定币发行商Circle周四首次公开募股10.5亿美元，这可能会刺激其他大型加密货币公司跟进，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对该行业的支持将使该行业受益。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Circle's $1.05 billion initial public offering on Thursday could spur other large crypto players to follow suit as the industry benefits from U.S. President Donald Trump's embrace of the sector, according to experts and analysts.】

item.title: 交易日：特朗普与马斯克的恩怨抨击股市
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: Sunnova Energy 申请破产保护
item.description: Sunnova Energy 周四表示，该公司已在美国申请破产保护，因为这家住宅太阳能电池板安装商正努力应对巨额债务和需求低迷的问题。【原文：Sunnova Energy said on Thursday it has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the United States, as the residential solar panel installer grapples with a massive debt pile and sluggish demand.】

item.title: 马斯克称 SpaceX 将退役 "龙 "飞船，与特朗普的争执升级
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的火箭公司 SpaceX 将立即开始退役其 "龙 "飞船，这位亿万富翁周四回应美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于政府应取消马斯克联邦合同的声明时说。【原文：Elon Musk's rocket company SpaceX will begin decommissioning its Dragon spacecraft immediately, the billionaire said on Thursday in response to U.S. President Donald Trump's statement that the government should cancel Musk's federal contracts.】

item.title: 瑞银从纽约银行聘用科技银行家拉尔森和米克维奇
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份备忘录，瑞银在纽约从美国银行聘请了两名技术投资银行家。【原文：UBS hired two technology investment bankers in New York from Bank of America, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会驳回质疑股东提案规则收紧的诉讼
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）规定，股东更难在公司年会上提交提案，包括就环境、社会和治理（ESG）问题进行改革。【原文：A federal judge on Thursday dismissed a lawsuit challenging U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission rule changes that made it harder for shareholders to file proposals at companies' annual meetings, including for reforms on environmental, social and governance (ESG) issues.】

item.title: 独家报道：巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）的目标是使非洲成为其在巴西以外的主要勘探地区
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席执行官周四表示，该公司的目标是将非洲作为其在巴西以外的主要发展地区，并补充说象牙海岸已为他们在其海岸附近的深海和超深海水域进行勘探铺上了 "红地毯"。【原文：Petrobras aims to make Africa its main region of development outside Brazil, the state-run oil firm's CEO said on Thursday, adding that Ivory Coast has extended the "red carpet" for them to explore in deep and ultra-deep waters off its coast.】

item.title: 空中客车公司证实五月份交付了 51 架喷气式飞机
item.description: 欧洲空中客车公司（Airbus）周四表示，该公司 5 月份交付了 51 架喷气式飞机，比去年同期下降了 4%。【原文：Europe's Airbus said on Thursday it had delivered 51 jets in May, down 4% from the same month last year.】
